title: Pajama guardians
body:
https://i.redd.it/4aghauxu3kw11.png

You know what is funny though? There are hardcore weebs who are going to buy them. And Riot knows it. 0 effort 100% exploitation. Just what would you expect from corporation that makes billions of dollars annually, but wont put single man hour of effort into fixing EU server issues, ingame bugs or optimizing the code. Welcome to the club riot, here you can sit by EA right across the Activision. Hope you enjoy your stay in hell.
